A look back at the year that was, before we head into 2025.

  • Author:

    Brooke Frischer

  • Publish date:

    Dec 30, 2024

Photo: Edward Berthelot/Getty Images

A look back at the year that was, before we head into 2025.

As we reach the final week of 2024, Fashionista editors are looking back on the very best of the year — from the most memorable fashion and beauty images seen across our social feeds and newsstands to the most effective and useful products we purchased. We're also reflecting on the biggest headlines in fashion news and some of our favorite Fashionista stories published over the last 12 months.

Click through to see all that and more. See you in 2025!
